Module count
Package count.model

Class Ancestor

java.lang.Object
count.model.Likelihood
count.model.Ancestor
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLDParameters
public class Ancestor
extends Likelihood
Likelihood computations for ancestral reconstruction at a node. The trick is to set extinction at 0.0 for the node where the ancestor copies are to be observed.
Author:
csuros
